places_with_reviews.name: Avadh Heritage Resort

reviews.text: Third class  dealer cause cheating with me what he said n gave me room is different without telling me.  Took double the price then our group. No kettle in room no napkins no service on last day.  Licage in bathroom.   Breakfast worst.   Lower staff was good.  But u have to call them.

There is no hot water to shower .The water heater is too small and the hot water will be for only a minute and no more. No kettles for boiling water  and to have tea or coffee in the rooms. Need to clean rooms. The breakfast  is pathetic  . Also tea served in small paper cups. You have to ask for things.
The rooms are spacious and awesome. Reception Service is a bit sluggish but overall good. Food was good.

We stayed there for 2 nights and the staff was through out very rude. A lady in restaurant served us cold buffet and kept us waiting for hot food and evntually shouted and fought with us. Management did not care to respond or take any action. VITS is some management company who has sourced some worst possible staff for the property. It is a plain wedding business hotel.
The taste was awesome, and food quality was superb, even service was good...one of the best restaurant in amreli with quality food 👍🏻👍🏻

places_with_reviews.name: Angel Lords Eco Inn Amreli
address: Old APMC, Market Yard Rd, Amreli Irrigation Division, D.L.B. Society, Amreli, Gujarat 365601, India

reviews.text:
HELLO SIR,

I CAME TO YOUR HOTEL FOR LUNCH, YOUR FOOD WAS THIRDCALSS QUALITY AND THE QUALITY OF 200ML WATER BOTTLE IN RECEPTION IS VERY BAD PLEASE EXCHANGE IT WITH BISLERI.

PLEASE AUCTION ON THIS COMPLAIN OTHERWISE I WILL NEVER COME IN YOUR HOTEL.🙁

It was great experience. I am stayed in room no 104 and I would like to give one small suggestion about room toilet facility. The toilet jet should be on right hand side but it is installed on left hand side. Which is very much difficult to handle.

Excellent place 5o stay. The road to hotel may you feel lost to wrong place but, once you enter the premises, it's not Amreli like small town.

Staff is so courteous at both reception and restaurant. The allocated parking is also very nice.

Full marks

Staff was inexperienced,
This is not staff mistakes, because manager *Dipak Sharma* doesn’t know about anything as a manager post. So staff can follow him too.
Mini bar is useless.
No proper communication.
Always charge for extra money.
Useless place
After leave hotel they are frightened us about police complaints.

Dear sir
If your payment is not made by 48 hours , a police complaint will be lodged in the name of the guest.
Regards : Hotel Front Office Department

Other guest also seen message like on top, they are treated as a animal

So be aware other guests.

Our stay at Hotel Angel Lords Amreli was marred by a regrettable encounter with the manager, Dipak Sharma. His rude behavior, including yelling at us, was entirely unacceptable and a stark departure from the level of service one would expect, especially during a special occasion like a honeymoon.

To compound matters, we were charged incorrectly, further highlighting serious issues with the hotel's billing accuracy. The combination of a manager's disrespectful conduct and erroneous charges has left an indelibly negative impression on our experience. We hope that the management takes these concerns seriously, as they significantly impacted what was meant to be a joyous and memorable stay.

Adding to the dismay, our disappointment with Hotel Angel Lords Amreli escalated when we received a threatening message. Shockingly, the hotel management not only mishandled our concerns but took it a step further by threatening us with a police complaint. Such unprofessional conduct and intimidation tactics are utterly unacceptable and further tarnish the reputation of the establishment

During our honeymoon at Hotel Angel Lords Amreli, the experience was far from what we had anticipated. To our dismay, we were charged extra for items that were supposed to be complimentary. This unexpected and unwarranted expense was frustrating, especially during such a special occasion.

What added to the disappointment was the behavior of the hotel staff. Their conduct was nothing short of the worst. Instead of addressing our concerns with courtesy and understanding, they exhibited a lack of professionalism that left a lasting negative impression.

A honeymoon is meant to be a time of joy and celebration, but our experience at Hotel Angel Lords Amreli cast a shadow over these precious moments. It's disheartening when an establishment fails to meet the expectations, especially during such a significant milestone. Our hope is that this feedback serves as a warning to others considering this hotel for their special occasions.

reviews.text:
They deserved lest than 1 star cz there is name of customer service i been waiting for hot water since one hour nd some show up said  whatever is coming that’s the hot water!! I was like seriously
But anyway check before you get room !!

My worst experience till date. Have to stay in hotel.
Didn't know how to talk to customers. I was told that customers like you are not needed. I was given checkout time of 10:30 and I left the room at 10:45. I am 15 minutes late Because of which I had to listen so bad

Staff behaviour not good,  Wifi not available, very bad hotel, for lunch & dinner menu card as compair to physically rates are different.
Please avoid to book this hotel

Rest everything is good but the power cut issue. I stayed there for 6 hours and thrice i observed power cut. Electricity was there only for 1 hour and i had to check out and move to another hotel at noon.

Do not stay here if you are traveling. The room smells because there is sewage nearby.
Hot water geysers weren’t working and so compact spaces compared to the price.
Owners are very rude, will not give you respect and response.
Hope this helps everyone.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Angel
address: Bhagwati Chowk, Station Rd, opp. Sudarshan Eye hospital, Manekpara, Amreli, Gujarat 365601, India

reviews.text: It's situated in the main market of Amreli, so problem starts with car parking on every entry occation! Staff service is good but rooms r too small. Family from big city would not rate this hotel as 3 Star!!!

A dismal dining experience unfolded at the restaurant—subpar food made with expired ingredients, a shortage of menu items, and semi-skilled staff confessing to the culinary missteps, leaving an overall unsatisfactory impression.
Budget friendly , helpful staff
No parking spaces. Rooms are also not good as per room fare.

Let me divide this review in three sections
1 location and parking:
The hotel is located in middle of the town. You can have easy access to bus stand and main market.
Parking is bit small that's why I cut one star.
2 rooms and room service :
Rooms size was average. The good thing is bathroom. It was large and everything was working properly.
Room service was up to the mark.
3 food:
Food was good. They served hot in our room. The complimentary breakfast was up to the mark.

places_with_reviews.name: RadheShyam Hotel
address: RADHESHYAM CHOKDI,Gavadka Road Bay Pass Amreli Bay Pass Road, Gujarat 365601, India

reviews.text:
Bcoz it's open I just gave a review.
It's a pathetic service and food quality.
There are no other options in this areas.
I'm from Vadodara.
This people have to understand how to behave and manage food quality.

We visited this restaurant while returning from Diu. I must say this hotel was our life saver as we looked for restaurants as we were starving a lot and there were no good restaurants on our route. Finally we reached and ordered food.
Regarding Service/Staffs : I must say, service was best and staff were very polite and professional. We were really happy with the person who was serving food for us.

Regarding food quality : Food was tasty and fresh. Chhanch was awesome. It was an odd time for lunch but still they prepared and served fresh food to us. The quantity was also good.

Location: Location is perfect as you can locate it from the road.

Parking Space : Plenty of space available for parking.

Other attractions - You can enjoy Paan and Kulhad wali Chai. Also branded chocolates are available.

So overall, I recommend this restaurant. You will surely enjoy their service and food.

Horrible manager. We literally cancelled our order and came out. He told us on face that we have taken an hour to order. Who the hell gives menu and stands in front of us while we are deciding what to order? Every damn restaurant gives us time to decide and come back to take the order. He told he is the only one available to take orders. That's why he was pressuring us🙄
He should have given us time to decide the order. Horrible guy. The way he spoke made us walk out.

Food test is Ok ok type. One time you may visit.
Food quality is also average.

Service is good.

The food was tasty
Means they provide taste according to ur requirements
Rotla was so crispy
Tasted so good with dal fry

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel City Palace
address: OPP MAIN BUS STAND, BUS STAND, ROAD, D.L.B. Society, Amreli, Gujarat 365601, India

reviews.text: Nice room, very comfortable.staff are good, specially shivam bhai, Manager is very helpful

Nice cosy and affordable rooms...any1 coming to Amreli for business trips or couples who arrive here to connect to Rajkot, Bhavnagar or to Diu......will like. Not recommended for those looking for something very lavish and spacious. Food is great. Room service is also fine. Overall great and recommended.
Cleaning, Services and behaviour was very good

Hotel City palace is a one of the good hotels in Amreli with all amenities to make your stay comfortable, there is a restaurant attached which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Since it is located on third floor of city point complex there is a lift which has a generator backup, located just opposite to Amreli bus depot. Rooms are clean and spacious. Room service is also good. There are VVIP rooms available as well. Ample Parking available in the basement. Overall a good place.

The Ambience is pretty good! Rates are quite affordable. Food was amazing and Service is satisfactory as well.

But, Room size was smaller then expected.

Overall the quality of service suffers big time for the menu rates this restaurant charges. Expect a roadside eatery like service.

It's one of the old and best restaurant available in Amreli. It's has garden within it so you can call it garden restaurant also. They provide it during marriage function, birthday celebration and engagement ceremony. Food is really tasty and awesome. They have Chinese, Punjabi and Gujarati options. Their Manchurian are really good!! Outside it there is food plaza where you can find dosa and fast food. Must visit when you are in Amreli.
